fields.name: AllowPrivilegeEscalation
fields.description: A boolean value indicating whether the init process can elevate its privileges

fields.name: Capabilities
fields.description: The capabilities to add or drop from a container.

fields.name: Privileged
fields.description: The flag to determine if the container permissions is elevated to Privileged.

fields.name: RunAsGroup
fields.description: Sets the User GID for the container.

fields.name: RunAsUser
fields.description: Sets the User UID for the container.

fields.name: SeccompProfile
fields.description: a base64 encoded string containing the contents of the JSON in the seccomp profile
